Package com.adminportal.repository

Interface UserRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,​java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,​java.lang.Integer>
    public interface UserRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,​java.lang.Integer>
    This Interface Extend CurdRepository to handle all database operation related to USER data
    Author:
    om prakash
